doc.repnme: Transcript of one hundred thirty-ninth special meeting of Executive Directors, held on Monday, September 30, 1957 : South Africa - Fourth Transport Project
doc.abstracts: This partial transcript, from the session of the Executive Directors held on Monday, September 30, 1957, covers only a proposed loan to the Union of South Africa for the Fourth Transport Project. This meeting addresses changes to the loan agreement in response to the postponement of a public issue of South African bonds on the New York market. Those bonds were originally intended to be issued in conjunction with the Bank loan. The discussion, therefore, centers on the Bank's business methods in situations of parallel financing with private bankers. The Executive Directors resolved to approve the revised loan.
